name: ReMoDDeD
savepath: This is going to be another interesting update, as it debuts the New Greedy Goblins feature, details of which can be found in-game and in our Discord. There are also some new enemies, summoning adjustments, skill alterations and general improvements made to pad out the update further. As always, user-reported suggestions and bug fixes were sprinkled in. We hope you enjoy yet another feature our mod pioneers for D2R!

Demon Tempering is a new system that allows you to combine body parts found from special monsters with special unique items to create a brand new item, with it's own special characteristics. This is an entirely new item quality; Tempered. Please both enjoy this dynamic system as well as be patient with it's future iterations. More info on this new addition can be found on our Discord and in your recipe menu.
